page.title: 04A DAY IN FULHAM
page.content: I get up on a Friday at 7.20a.m.I go an get some breakfast.My breakfast is 2 eggs and some bacon.I get ready for school at 8.00 and then I get my mum up.I go to school at 8.30 and get there at 8.55.The first lesson is English and then we have a break for five minutes and then we have a Spanish lesson.It lasts for 1 hour and then we have a second break,for 15 mins.After this we have Art and then lunch.I often have a roll & fish fingers. After lunch we have Science and go home at 3.30.I get home at 4 p.m. and put on the T.V.until dinner at 6p.m.Then I play football until about 7p.m. and then watch more T.V. until bedtime at 11.00 p.m.
